mapper.insert: insert into comment_board values ( comment_board_seq.nextval, #{ boardCommentLevel }, #{ boardCommentWriter }, #{ boardCommentContent }, #{ perNo }, #{ boardCommentRef }, default )
mapper.select: select * from comment_board where per_no = #{ perNo } order by board_comment_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from comment_board where board_comment_no = #{ boardCommentNo }
